thread.section_title: Soundstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soundstore | www.soundstore.ie
thread.title: John F. O'Sullivan
thread.title_full: Soundstore reviewed by John F. O'Sullivan

author: John F. O'Sullivan
title: John F. O'Sullivan
text: This service was superb from the order placed to the delivery made, in the prompt issuing of acknowledgement of order and confirmation of delivery date and time just one and a half hours later ( I have not experienced this level of efficiency before), to the text notification of delivery on the day advised and the bonus of a phone call giving a delivery time one and a half hours earlier than the earliest time notified in the text. I will always try Soundstore first in future for my next purchase.
